body: No, `num_derivatives=0` is not specific to `ToONNX` pass in any way. We use it e.g. when running `word_language_model` example with `num_derivatives=1`
body_html: No, num_derivatives=0 is not specific to ToONNX pass in any way. We use it e.g. when running word_language_model example with num_derivatives=1
